title: Marco's Pizza Tops $1 Billion in Sales
itunes:title: Marco's Pizza Tops $1 Billion in Sales
description:
Tony Libardi, President and Co-CEO of Marco’s Pizza, discusses hitting the $1 billion annual system-wide sales milestone, demonstrating growth as a top 5 U.S. pizza brand.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
